title: BBC.Glastonbury.2013.06.28.720p.HDTV.XviD.AC3
description:
I downloaded this content as two .TS (transmission stream) files which correspond to part of the BBC coverage of the first day (June 28th) of the annual music festival at Glastonbury 2013. I haven't actually watched the entire thing, I downloaded it and converted it to 720p XviD/AC3 as a demonstration in a tutorial video about using VirtualDub (and in this case Avidemux).

So, I don't plan to keep seeding this but since I've prepared it (and the quality is phenomenal) I thought it would be a shame to delete the file before giving people a chance to download and seed it for general purpose playback and use. Being an AVI in XviD/AC3 format makes this file compatible with pretty much all DVD players and home computers that can handle a video data rate of 4 Kbps (that's crystal-clear HDTV but not so resource-demanding as to bog down a low-end modern system).

I will keep seeding this until I see another stable seed then I will delete the file in order to recover hard drive space.

******************************************************
NOTE: Included is a sample from the video so you can get an idea of the actual quality before committing to a 6 Gig download.
******************************************************
